overview: From 2025-12-18 to 2025-12-19, elizaos-plugins/plugin-anthropic had 0 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: COT support & add topP option support
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Adds configurable CoT budgets and topP support, updating text handlers, Anthropic client, and build settings.
> 
> - **Text generation (models)**:
>   - Add `topP` support with exclusive selection vs `temperature` (throws if both provided) and pass through to `generateText`.
>   - Add CoT budget injection via `providerOptions.anthropic.thinking` using `getCoTBudget` (small/large with fallback).
>   - Improve `maxTokens` resolution and include agent metadata in `experimental_telemetry`.
> - **Providers**:
>   - Introduce `createAnthropicClientWithTopPSupport` that strips `temperature` when `top_p` is present and `temperature` is 0.
> - **Config**:
>   - Expose new env settings: `ANTHROPIC_COT_BUDGET`, `ANTHROPIC_COT_BUDGET_SMALL`, `ANTHROPIC_COT_BUDGET_LARGE` and implement `getCoTBudget`.
> - **Build**:
>   - Set `tsconfig.build.json` `skipLibCheck` to `false`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit cffb51219c12e4ad62b43679c466bfe4d923088a. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Configurable Chain-of-Thought (CoT) budget settings (global and per-model size).
  * Improved handling of temperature vs topP to avoid parameter conflicts during text generation.
  * Provider now supports topP-based generation and includes enhanced telemetry metadata.

* **Chores**
  * Tightened TypeScript build checks to catch more type issues during builds.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
